body_html: this is expected behavior. if you have your pip configured to python 2.7 (which you can check with pip --version), you have to use pip install for python 2.7. If you want to install packages for python 3, then i guess pip3 makes sense in your case.
body_text: this is expected behavior. if you have your pip configured to python 2.7 (which you can check with pip --version), you have to use pip install for python 2.7. If you want to install packages for python 3, then i guess pip3 makes sense in your case.
body: this is expected behavior. if you have your `pip` configured to python 2.7 (which you can check with `pip --version`), you have to use `pip install` for python 2.7. If you want to install packages for python 3, then i guess `pip3` makes sense in your case.
